text: Benjamin Becker was the defending champion but chose to compete in Monte Carlo instead. Kevin Anderson won in the final 6–7(7), 7–6(7), 6–1 against Tobias Kamke. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ===Bottom Half=== ==References== *Main Draw *Qualifying Singles Baton Rouge Pro Tennis Classic - Singles
title: 2010 Baton Rouge Pro Tennis Classic – Singles
